title: Udemy - Kickoff your Public Speaking Career
description:
Description

Ever wonder what the difference is between an icon like Tony Robbins and any other trainer/motivational speaker?In this course, we’ll see together why and how adults learn. Then,you will be mentally prepared to deliver your session. Afterwards, I will help you prepare every physical detail about the course; from yourbody language to the logistics of the place you will deliver your training or presentation at.Most importantly, in this course you will learn how to handle different kinds of questions, and how to end your courses on a high so that people would want to hear more from you.You should take this course if you want to become an outstanding trainer.
Who is the target audience?

    Beginners who want to deliver outstanding presentations
    Beginners who wants to be successful trainers
    Passionate teachers who teacher adults and want to improve themselves

Requirements

    You should be passionate about becoming a trainer
    You don’t have to be an extrovert

parsed.dn: Udemy - Kickoff your Public Speaking Career
parsed.name: Udemy - Kickoff your Public Speaking Career
